title: BUG - Galio W doesn't heal Galio's HP off of Twitch Poison DoT
body:
If an enemy Twitch attacks an ally and you shield them as Galio, you do not recover HP.

Just encountered this in an ARAM. Was quite annoyed.

Hope this gets fixed eventually.

replies.body:
See if you can re-create it in a custom and maybe experiment with the other DOT interactions (Cas, Teemo, Ignite). [From what I have seen it has been a thing since 2013](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1mziz1/galios_bulwark_doesnt_interact_with_a_few/) so i'm not sure if intended (Twitch true damage) or a bug.

If you can, check [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D

Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥
